name: Pacman Rebuilt
description:
This is an attempt and prototype  of the Classic Pac-Man Arcade. The game have some issues or bugs and will be fixed soon but you can play the level 1. More levels coming soon!

Controls:

Press P: PAUSE the game.

KEYBOARD (Arrows):

  • Down Arrow ↓ : Pacman goes down
  • Up Arrow ↑ :  Pacman goes up
  • Left Arrow ← : Pacman goes left
  • Right Arrow → : Pacman goes right

MOUSE (Beta: There are issues)

  • Left Button: Pacman goes left
  • Right Button: Pacman goes right
  • Wheel Up: Pacman goes up
  • Wheel Down: Pacman goes down.

NOTE:  It's recommended that you press the key or the mouse button before heading to the place you want.
